scripts.benchmarkToolsESBuildRunNode: node customTools.esbuild.mjs --format esm --tools benchmark --runtime node && node dist-esbuild/benchmark/controller.mjs
scripts.benchmarkToolsESBuildRunDeno: node customTools.esbuild.mjs --format esm --tools benchmark --runtime deno && deno run -A dist-esbuild/benchmark/controller.mjs
scripts.dataGenerator: node customTools.esbuild.mjs --format esm --tools dataGenerator --runtime node && node dist-esbuild/dataGenerator.mjs
scripts.saveFileEditor: node customTools.esbuild.mjs --format esm --tools saveFileEditor --runtime node && node dist-esbuild/saveFileEditor.mjs
